name: agent-host-ui
description: Chat UI for Agent Host application

scripts.build: npm run prebuild && parcel build src/tmp_build/index.html src/tmp_build/admin.html --dist-dir ../static --public-url /static --no-scope-hoist
scripts.dev: npm run predev && parcel src/tmp_build/index.html src/tmp_build/admin.html
scripts.watch: node build-template.js && parcel watch src/tmp_build/index.html src/tmp_build/admin.html --dist-dir ../static --public-url /static --no-scope-hoist
